backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing user profile storage, key-value entry management, and access-controlled endpoints using AccessControl, MixinAuthorization, and MixinStorage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping the UltraSound Pro full-copy feature to its constituent frontend files, component dependencies, and test IDs with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries for each frontend source file, serving as a reference index for the UltraSound Pro project's components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Root CSS file with Tailwind directives and OKLCH-based CSS custom properties defining light and dark theme tokens for backgrounds, borders, charts, and sidebar colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the UltraSound Pro app, setting the page title, favicon, viewport meta, and mounting the React app via /src/main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component orchestrating all hooks and UI sections (player, BT speakers, processor tabs) with EQ state, engine selection, playlist management, and playback controls.
frontend/src/components/AudioEngineFallb: Fallback UI component displayed when the Web Audio API is unsupported, showing a styled message with browser recommendations.
frontend/src/components/BatteryWidget.ts: Animated battery charging widget displaying percentage fill, stored/charger/output power stats, and lock/unlock messages based on BatteryState.
frontend/src/components/BluetoothSpeaker: Real-time Bluetooth speaker visualization component that reads analyser frequency data and animates three speaker images with dB, wattage, scale, and glow per speaker.
frontend/src/components/EQStabilizer.tsx: Renders a grid of EQ band sliders and instrument gain sliders, applying debounced updates to the audio engine and displaying boost/cut/center counts in a legend.
frontend/src/components/Equalizer.tsx: Empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: A React class-based error boundary that catches rendering errors, displays an error message with a retry button, and optionally labels the failing section.
frontend/src/components/FilePicker.tsx: Provides a drag-and-drop file upload zone and a stream URL input field, passing selected audio files or stream URLs to parent callbacks.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the app header with the UltraSound Pro logo, title, and a sound engine selector component.
frontend/src/components/InstrumentContro: Empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/components/PlayerControls.t: Displays playback controls (play/pause, skip, seek bar, volume) for the current track, with special handling for live streams and an error banner.
frontend/src/components/Playlist.tsx: Renders a scrollable list of audio tracks with active/playing indicators, format badges, and per-track remove buttons; shows an empty state when no tracks are loaded.
frontend/src/components/ProcessorPage.ts: Displays a real-time DSP processor dashboard with animated chip status cards, a 32-bar frequency visualizer, and auto-detected/auto-fixed audio issues driven by an animation loop.
frontend/src/components/SoundEngineSelec: Renders a row of buttons for selecting one of four named sound engines, highlighting the active selection with gold styling.
frontend/src/components/SoundMagnet.tsx: Canvas-based animated visualizer that draws concentric rings, rotating spokes, and a pulsing core driven by real-time audio analyser data, showing an OFF state when disabled.
frontend/src/components/SoundMagnetToggl: Toggle button with a magnet icon that switches the Sound Magnet feature on or off, updating its styling to reflect the current state.
frontend/src/components/SpectrumVisualiz: Canvas-based frequency spectrum visualizer that draws 64 color-gradient bars from analyser data when playing, or faint idle bars when stopped.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor, invalidating dependent queries whenever the identity or actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioEngine.ts: Defines an AudioEngine class that manages a Web Audio API chain (20-band EQ filters, gain node, analyser) and exposes a singleton-backed React hook for interacting with it.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioFiles.ts: Hook that manages a list of local audio files and stream URLs, handling format validation, object URL lifecycle, duration extraction, and add/remove operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioPlayer.ts: Hook that controls an HTMLAudioElement for playback (play, pause, resume, seek, volume), wiring it through the AudioEngine and exposing reactive player state.
frontend/src/hooks/useBatteryCharging.ts: Hook that simulates a 12-second battery charge animation using requestAnimationFrame, exposing percentage, watts, output power, and an unlocked flag.
frontend/src/hooks/useCanvasAnimation.ts: Utility hook that wraps a draw function in a requestAnimationFrame loop with start/stop controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication via DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder module that satisfies the import structure for a queries hook; no actual queries are implemented.
frontend/src/hooks/useSoundMagnet.ts: Simple React hook that manages a boolean on/off toggle state with a memoized toggle callback.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet importing Tailwind directives and Google Fonts, defining CSS variables for the app's dark/gold/blue theme, glassmorphism panels, custom scrollbars, and EQ slider styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that mounts the root component wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/audioConstants.ts: Defines EQ frequency bands, gain limits, frequency labels, and named sound engine presets (gain arrays) used by the audio equalizer.
frontend/src/utils/debounce.ts: Generic debounce utility that delays invoking a function until after a specified delay has elapsed since the last call.
frontend/src/utils/instrumentMappings.ts: Defines 20 instrument definitions (id, name, emoji, icon path, color, band index) and a reverse lookup array mapping EQ band indices to instrument array indices.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with custom fonts, gold/blue/dark brand colors, shadcn/ui OKLCH color tokens, glow box shadows, and accordion animations.
project_state.json: Tracks the current state of an ultra-premium music player web app (version 31), documenting its architecture, existing features, and known issues including broken audio playback, non-functional Smart Chips, and UI layout problems.
